name: Spine AI
long_description:
Spine (YC S23) builds reliable AI infrastructure. Spine powers Facets, the AI Operating System purpose-built for Private Markets (VC, PE, Credit & more).

Facets automates critical workflows—like LP meeting preparation, DDQ responses, portfolio analysis, compliance tracking, market research, and memo creation—delivering synthesized intelligence instantly.

Facets empowers IR teams to effectively represent funds to LPs, accelerating fundraising cycles and enabling faster closings.

Facets enables investors to operate with greater speed, make smarter decisions, and achieve a competitive edge.

Learn more about Facets: https://www.facets.vc/
